Fields.FinancialBankConnectIntro:
Why link your bank account?
Why make things difficult by repeatedly downloading bank files like MT940 or CAMT053? Or chasing your accountant to ask: Have your latest bank transactions been uploaded? To save you that hassle and make things easy, you can give InvoiceHippo access to your business bank account. That way we can import your latest bank movements daily and your data stays up to date — convenient, right?

Is it safe to connect?
Absolutely. Our connection uses a secure link. The partner who provides this service, GoCardless, holds the required licence for this.

What about my data?
Your data stays in InvoiceHippo, protected and secure. Everything goes over an encrypted connection, just like your bank. We do not sell customer data.

Sync cycle
InvoiceHippo performs a daily sync early in the morning, around: 06:00

Fields.TemplateEnableCustomTemplate: enable this option if you want to upload and use your own template design
Fields.TemplateEnableCustomTemplatePostI:
In InvoiceHippo, you can create your own MS Word template for invoices and/or quotes. This page shows the keys/placeholders you can use within the template. The instruction block provides a summary on how to use the keys within a template. Download our template as an example and start creating your unique template immediately.

Note! We use the standard template as default unless you've uploaded your own! Forgetting to upload a template defaults to one of our pre-defined templates! If you've selected one previously, the specific chosen template type is used as default. This ensures a consistent delivery of invoices or quotes!
Fields.TemplateEnableCustomTemplatePreIn: In InvoiceHippo, you can use a number of pre-defined invoice/quote templates. However, if you want to decide how your invoice/quote looks and what you wish to display, use the option below to use your own template.
Fields.TemplateMergeInstructions: Instructions Here you can see how a placeholder key can be used within an MS Word template. All keys without a switch tag need to be used like this: <<[CustomerNr]>> Keys with an html switch tag should be used like this: <<[CustomerNr] -html>> Keys with an if switch tag can be used like this: <<if [HasCompanyKvkNr]>> ... <<if>> <<if [HasCompanyLogoUrl]>> ... <<elseif [HasInvoiceDeliveryDate]>> ... <<if>> <<if [HasCompanyLogoUrl]>> ... <<elseif [HasCompanyKvkNr] ... <<elseif [HasInvoiceDeliveryDate]>> ... <<if>> Keys with a foreach switch tag can be used like this: <<foreach [in Products]>> ... <<foreach>> <<foreach [in CustomFields]>> <<[Title]>> ... <<foreach>> <<foreach [in Products]>> <<[Title]>>, <<[UnitPrice]>> ... <<foreach>> It's of course possible to combine these statements as you see fit! See below per category the potential placeholders.
Fields.TemplatePredefinedTemplateSelecti: select one of our predefined templates

Select one of our predefined invoice templates by simply clicking on it here. Don't forget to click save after making your selection. You can see a preview by creating a new invoice and choosing the preview option or do the same with an existing invoice.
Fields.TemplateShowErrorsOnCustomTemplat: show template errors while downloading the invoice

This option allows you to identify any errors in your template. Disable it to prevent clients from seeing these errors! Use this only when setting up a new template and when troubleshooting the generation process.
Fields.TermsAndConditionsAndExtraAttachm:
With InvoiceHippo, you can send your terms and conditions as attachments with both invoices and quotes. The terms should be uploaded as a PDF file! Note that for quotes, the terms and conditions must also be uploaded separately if you want them as an extra attachment.

Additionally, you have the option to add an extra attachment just for invoices! As an extra attachment, a PDF or Excel document can be attached. The extra attachment is always sent, regardless of the option status to include terms and conditions!
enable this option if you want to send the terms and conditions as an extra attachment with invoices
enable this option if you want to send the terms and conditions as an extra attachment with quotes

LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote10Des: InvoiceHippo brings your invoices, quotes and payments together in one smart place. Everything organised, without the fuss.
LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote1Desc: Simple. Fast. Reliable. That’s how accounting should be. Create and manage your invoices in no time.
LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote2Desc: With InvoiceHippo you keep control and make bookkeeping easy. No more endless Excel sheets — everything clear and smartly organised.
LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote3Desc: From quote to payment — with InvoiceHippo you have everything at hand. Less hassle, more control over your business.
LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote4Desc: Spend your time on what really matters. InvoiceHippo helps you complete your bookkeeping quickly and smoothly.
LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote5Desc: Professional invoices, automatic reminders and a clear overview of your payments. InvoiceHippo makes your bookkeeping reliable and simple.
LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote6Desc: You focus on your business; InvoiceHippo handles the bookkeeping — easy and worry-free.
LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote6Titl: Let the hippo do the heavy lifting
LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote7Desc: Like a hippo in the water: smooth, quick and effortless. Bookkeeping can be that simple.
LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote8Desc: Forget the hassle of admin. With InvoiceHippo you keep everything organised — and even enjoyable.
LoginAndRegistration.FrontPageQuote9Desc: Large, powerful and reliable — yet surprisingly easy to use.

Your registration is successful and you are almost ready to start. You will receive a verification email at the provided email address: {0}. We do this to ensure you can verify your ownership of the provided email address!

If you haven't received the email after 5 minutes, please check your spam box and if you use Gmail, check the 'promotions' folder. If you still can't find it, email us at support@invoicehippo.nl or message us via the chat on the site so we can assist you in activating your account.

Common.FormatInfoCustomerNr:
For example C%year%-%nr% becomes C2016-0001
placeholders: %year% = year, example: 2020
%nr% = current index, example: 0001
Common.FormatInfoInvoiceNr:
For instance, I%year%-%nr% becomes I2016-0001
Placeholder:
%yyyy% = current year, example: 2020
%yy% = current year, example: 20
%nr% = current invoice index, example: 0001
%nr1% = current invoice index, example: 1
%nr2% = current invoice index, example: 01
%nr3% = current invoice index, example: 001
%fdd% = invoice day, example: 21
%fmm% = invoice month, example: 05
%fyy% = invoice year, example: 20
%fyyyy% = invoice year, example: 2020
Common.FormatInfoProductNr:
For example P%year%-%nr% becomes P2016-0001
placeholders: %year% = year, example: 2020
%nr% = current index, example: 0001
Common.FormatInfoQuoteNr:
For instance, O%year%-%nr% becomes O2016-0001
Placeholder:
%yyyy% = current year, example: 2020
%yy% = current year, example: 20
%nr% = current quote index, example: 0001
%nr1% = current quote index, example: 1
%nr2% = current quote index, example: 01
%nr3% = current quote index, example: 001
%fdd% = invoice day, example: 21
%fmm% = invoice month, example: 05
%fyy% = invoice year, example: 20

DashboardIntro.WelcomeWizP1Description1:
Before you start!
We'd like to quickly get you going, so we ask you to go through a few steps to set up your account properly. This will take less than 1 minute of your time. You’ll be able to create and send your first invoice right away.
DashboardIntro.WelcomeWizP1Description2: This guide is here to easily help you set up your account
DashboardIntro.WelcomeWizP3DoYouHaveAlte: Do you have a different billing address?
This billing address is used by <strong>InvoiceHippo<strong> to invoice you if you decide to purchase a paid package.
DashboardIntro.WelcomeWizP4IntroductionI:
These are your starting numbers for invoices, products, quotes, and clients.
This means that at each year-end, your sequences, such as invoice numbers, will restart with this number.
Here, you can define how an invoice number is structured. This allows you to generate an invoice number that aligns with your preferences. The same applies for products, quotes, and customers.
